evSOLve.JEvolution.selection

Class Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • evSOLve.JEvolution.selection.Selection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecimationSelection, NoSelection, TournamentSelection

    public abstract class Selection
extends java.lang.Object
    The Selection class for implementation of various selection methods.
    Since:
    June 8, 2001
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    Helmut A. Mayer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double lethalValue
      The fitness value of a lethal individual (default Double.NaN).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Selection() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void doSelect(SubPopulation parents, SubPopulation offspring)
      The selection method implementing the core principle of an EA: survival of the fittest.
      double getLethalValue()
      Returns the value of a lethal individual, which is not considered for selection.
      protected void removeLethals(SubPopulation pop)
      Removes lethal individuals of the sub-population.
      void setLethalValue(double lethalValue)
      Sets the value of a lethal individual, which is not considered for selection.

      • doSelect

        public abstract void doSelect(SubPopulation parents,
            SubPopulation offspring)
        The selection method implementing the core principle of an EA: survival of the fittest.
        Parameters:
        parents - the SubPopulation under pressure
        offspring - the SubPopulation of survivors

      • getLethalValue

        public double getLethalValue()
        Returns the value of a lethal individual, which is not considered for selection.
        Returns:
        the lethal fitness value

      • setLethalValue

        public void setLethalValue(double lethalValue)
        Sets the value of a lethal individual, which is not considered for selection.
        Parameters:
        lethalValue - the lethal fitness value

      • removeLethals

        protected void removeLethals(SubPopulation pop)
        Removes lethal individuals of the sub-population.
        Parameters:
        pop - a sub-population
